alert.note: Alert for Barrow; Gwinnett; Hall; Jackson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 12:44PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Barrow, Gwinnett, northwestern Walton, south central Hall and west central Jackson Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1243 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Hog Mountain, or near Lawrenceville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lawrenceville, Winder, Jefferson, Duluth, Sugar Hill, Snellville, Suwanee, Buford, Lilburn, Loganville, Norcross, Braselton, Auburn, Dacula, Grayson, Hoschton, Pendergrass, Carl, Rest Haven, and Fort Yargo State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
